tabs.name: VALID: signature and expire time for the Approov token
VALID: But without the token biding header
INVALID: Missing the Authentication Header with a valid Approov Token
INVALID: Missing the Approov Token
INVALID: Misssing the expiration time in the Approov token
INVALID: expired timestamp for a valid signed Approov token
INVALID: Malformed Approov token
INVALID: signature for the Approov token
INVALID: Token binding not macthing the Authorization header
